name: Megadrive Template Generator V2
description: Generate posting template for drive link for movies/series. Made by jsmsj#5252

bot_token.description: Discord Bot token, follow this tutorial to generate it. https://discordpy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/discord.html

prefix.description: Prefix of your discord bot Make sure to add a space after the prefix Eg: 'md '  Don't add the quotation marks !!!

custom_message.description: Custom message to append at end of each upload

sa_email.description: Email id of the service account. (open any serviceaccount.json file there you can find it. Not required though, but recommended for faster template generation). Leave empty if you do not know what it is. Looks like: mfc-something@iam.gserviceaccount.com

private_key.description: The private_key of service account, (open any serviceaccount.json file there you can find it) Write it only if you have entered service account email. Leave empty if you do not know what it is. Looks like: -----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----SOMETHINGSOMETHINGSOMETHING\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----\n
